createFileReaderFromFixture

private Reader createFileReaderFromFixture(String fixtureFile)
                                    throws FileNotFoundException,
                                           URISyntaxException
Create reader from given fixture file name relative to FIXTURE_DIR.

Parameters:
fixtureFile - Filename relative to FIXTURE_DIR.
Returns:
Return reader object.
Throws:
FileNotFoundException - If file not found.
URISyntaxException - If file name is bad.
